attributes.action: Give England a 1 day National holiday after a successful Euros final.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe the England national team (mens) have done amazingly well after everything Covid-19 threw at us.

After 55 years of not getting to the finals of a major tournament, it is only right the nation enjoy a national holiday once the cup comes back home.

People will be sensible in our celebrations 🍾
attributes.background:
I want the government to give us a national holiday once the team win the Euros. 

The country deserves something to celebrate after  several lockdowns.

rejection.details: We're all really proud of the England team for getting to the 2020 European Championship final, but unfortunately they didn't win the match. So we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
